title: Facebook/Giphy Merger Worries UK Competition Watchdog
text: The U.K.'s Competition Market Authority (CMA) has raised some concerns about Facebook's merger with the GIF provider Giphy that could derail the deal. The CMA said on Thursday (Aug. 12) that its provisional findings suggest the merger will harm competition between social media platforms and remove a display ad challenger from the market.

title: Facebook Blocks Russia Based Ad Agency Behind COVID-19 Vaccine Smear Campaign
text: Facebook Inc (NASDAQ: FB) removed multiple accounts linked to a mysterious advertising agency operating out of Russia that sought to pay social media influencers to deride COVID-19 vaccines made by Pfizer Inc (NYSE: PFE) and AstraZeneca plc (NASDAQ: AZN). A network of 65 Facebook accounts and 243 Instagram accounts was traced back to Fazze, Russia-based advertising and marketing firm working on behalf of an unknown client.

title: Facebook delays return to office until January 2022 for U.S., some international employees
Facebook delays return to office until January 2022
text: Facebook Inc. has delayed a return of U.S. employees to the office until at least January 2022 because of continuing issues with the delta variant.

title: Facebook delays return to office for employees until January
text: Facebook said on Thursday it has pushed back its office return date for all U.S. and some international employees until January due to concerns over the highly infectious Delta variant. “Given the recent health data showing rising COVID cases based on the Delta variant, our teams in the U.S. will not be required to go back.

title: Facebook delays return to US offices to 2022
text: The company will also require COVID-19 vaccinations for employees.
